newsitem.title: POLAND: German firm mulls DM 40 mln factory in Poland - PAP.
newsitem.headline: German firm mulls DM 40 mln factory in Poland - PAP.

text.p: Germany's Stahlschmidt & Maivorn is mulling to invest 40 million marks in building a factory producing aluminium wheels in the town of Stalowa Wola in Poland, PAP news agency said on Monday.
PAP quoted the spokesman of the Huta Stalowa Wola steel mill as saying mill signed an initial agreement with the German company to sell it the area where the factory would be built.
"The Stalowa Wola steel mill signed an initial agreement with the German firm on selling it...2.6 hectares, where the Germans will build the factory," PAP quoted Antoni Kopyto as saying.
The factory would employ 150 people in the first stage, PAP said, without quoting any sources.
